name: Philips Telespiel ES-2201 Ports (Channel F)
description:
First Released:  October 8th 2021 (Ghost Chaser)
First Released: Novemeber 12th 2021 (Clay Pigeon Shooting)

1-2 Player  games, though intended as 2 Player games

Ports of the Philips Telespiel ES-2201 games - a half way system between 1st generation and 2nd generation consoles similar to the PC-50X, developed by Philips and often overlooked but with some unique games at a time when home video games were flooded with bat and ball clones.

Ghost Chaser is a simple reaction game, you wait for the ghost to move and then press the button. Winner is who ever presses first - you lose if you press too soon.

Clay Pigeon Shooting is a game for 1 or 2 players, where one player shoots and the other aims to move out the way by either changing speed or slightly changing horizontal position. The control setup means that in a one player situation, they can alter the position and speed of the target for accuracy challenges without the need of a second player.
